    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_113220</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hess's law</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz Hesss</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La loi de Hess</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lei de Hess</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legge del Hess</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νόμος Hess</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ley de Hess</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that enthalpy changes for each route. Hess law states that enthalpy change for the two routes must be equal.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enthalpy change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Hess law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">products</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reactants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Enthalpie für jeden 
Weg ändert. Hess Gesetz gibt an, daß Enthalpieänderung für 
die zwei Wege gleich sein muß.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'enthalpie change 
pour chaque itinéraire. La loi de Hess déclare que le 
changement d'enthalpie pour les deux itinéraires doit être égal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o enthalpy muda para
cada rota. A lei de Hess indica que a mudança do enthalpy para 
as duas rotas deve ser igual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'entalpia cambia
per ogni itinerario. La legge di Hess dichiara che il 
cambiamento di entalpia per i due itinerari deve essere uguale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η ενθαλπία αλλάζει για
κάθε διαδρομή. Ο νόμος Hess δηλώνει ότι η αλλαγή 
ενθαλπίας για τις δύο διαδρομές πρέπει να είναι ίση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la entalpia cambia 
para cada ruta. La ley de Hess indica que el cambio de la 
entalpia para las dos rutas debe ser igual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enthalpieänderung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hess Gesetz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Produkte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changement d'enthalpie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Loi de Hess</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
